posts.post_title: For sale: T206 Armbruster with misprinted back
posts.post_content:
Front of card is centered but the Piedmont back is misaligned, with part of a second Piedmont emblem showing on the right of the card. $150 delivered. PM to confirm

Thanks!

Chris
